website_summaries.verdict: Classic can rack design is durable and built to withstand plenty of weight.
pros: Rack comes with adjustable plastic dividers
Once assembled, the sturdy rack holds up to 36 cans
Easily relocate a full rack with no fear of it falling apart
cons: Photo-only instructions are difficult to follow

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It is sturdy and accomplished the organization I needed in our pantry.
customer_reviews.author: PeteD

customer_reviews.title: Great, Adjusted for Shelf Height
customer_reviews.text: These can racks greatly expanded my storage space. The space between my metal racks was a hair short, but I took apart the central part and turned the sides upside down so the handle bumps faced down and inserted between the shelf grids, then assembled as usual. Fits like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mac

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  You 2, can make your pantry look awesome! LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE love love this product! I took everything out of my pantry and started over....These are a great product---I purchased 4. Sturdy--not difficult at all to put together. Soooo glad I purchased 4, as I like neat shelves (maybe I have a pinch of "ocd"?) and wow---does my pantry look awesome! *update* #5 arrived today! Bob had it put together and I had it on a pantry shelf in less than 15 minutes! I LOVE the way these racks hold all my canned items! Pictures are b4 adding #5. will update as soon as I finish my pantry make-over!
customer_reviews.author: Debbers98569

customer_reviews.title: Some alterations were required
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product because the shelf’s did not fit the sides were to wide so I had to pry open the rear loops and move the sides in so the shelf’s would fit then close the loops, also the dividers were not even close to fitting the way the instructions show I had to make my own, I purchased two of these and both were the same someone from DecoBros needs to put these together and make the proper alterations I was able to make the adjustments and they worked fine other than the fit and assembly it is a nice rack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this shelf so much I might give it a name
customer_reviews.text: I am so very happy with this product! I had no problem putting it together. There were a few confusing parts, but easily worked through by looking closely at the diagrams and reading the instructions. All in all, under 10 minutes. And the end result is soooooo satisfying! I freed up so much space! Even if I had all the pantry space in the world, this is just a sensible way to store cans. I will never go back to stacking cans on a shelf ever again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hawthorn

customer_reviews.title: This was SUPER frustrating to put together and should’ve taken only a ...
customer_reviews.text: Janky piece of metal- should’ve read through the low ratings and avoided. This was SUPER frustrating to put together and should’ve taken only a few mins. None of the hooks were made correctly and the main frame was bent so there’s no way it will ever be a solid, stable unit. I shouldn’t have to take pliers and other tools to a new unit. Half of the cheap plastic dividers just pop off because those few aren’t long enough to even hook on. There seems to be a HUGE quality control issue with these.
customer_reviews.author: Tuffman

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I really needed something to store cans. However, with all of the different sizes, it’s hard to fit them all nicely. I got it to work and it will do for now. It’s sturdy and was simple to put together, as soon as I realized the sides needed to be spun around in step 1. ;) I’ll keep and use mine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Great product, double check width
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, no issues with assembly, and they also sent out an email for troubleshooting the product if it didn't seem to be assembled correctly, which I didn't need, but I still think its awesome how fast they reached out proactively. The only thing I would change about this product if possible, would be the dimmensions, and make the shelves longer instead of wider. The width was a slight hiccup for me and where I was putting this, so I actually had to turn the entire shelf sideways, but its still effective, I just had to make a chart at what is at the back!
customer_reviews.author: Caiti49

customer_reviews.title: Yes you need this.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought. I love it. It’s easy to put together and fits nicely in my pantry. I’m thinking about buying a third one. It came with aseparator bars and you can stack them. I didn’t stack them due to space but it was a nice to have the option.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality & Flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It allows me to add 29 oz cans (think pumpkin/tomato cans) and smaller 15 oz cans. It was pretty easy to put together. The design allows for sliding the divider either left or right to accommodate different size cans. It is sloped toward the front so cans roll forward. Mine is sitting on a metal shelf so adding cans to the back is a little difficult but I manage fine. The best thing about this product is I can find what I need and the cans don't fall off the shelf any more.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup, good racks
customer_reviews.text: My only real complaints are that it's not FIFO and that the dividers are a bit weak. One extra divider would also be really helpful; there are three extra end caps but no extra dividers, and there are lots of small canned items out there that can fit four across. Overall, though, these are really nice stands. The written directions are a bit sparse but the pictures are clear if you give yourself a second, and the set-up is incredibly easy. I'm not handy at all and I put together four of these in about 20 minutes. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t save extra space
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t really save you much space it’s actualy quite bulky. I couldn’t fit it on any of my cupboard shelves and gave it away. It took up the same amount of room that the cans held previously tho. The shelves wouldn’t clasp into place on one level also so it just flopped around. The row dividers would not stay on the shelves at all. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MommaShoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: This can organizer is exactly what I wanted! It's easy to assemble and holds a ton of cans! The best thing about it is that you can stack this until higher with more organizers! I'm so happy that I finally bought it! The only problem was that I didn't order it sooner! Now we can see exactly what we have before running to the store. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to assemble, great storage.
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer! I have used the kind you can get at Walmart before (the white coated metal ones), and I found them to be very flimsy. So, I was super impressed with how durable this one is. Within 10 minutes of delivery l, I had it put together with my cans on it. It was super easy to assemble, and I was surprised at how much this can hold. I'm able to fit a lot, including the large 28oz cans and tuna cans. My only gripe is that it wish I could order more of those little separaters, as they come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that there was soooo much plastic wrap inside the box. Other than that, these shelves are awesome. We have one that we use with canned food, and the other with canned sparkling water/juice drinks. The only complaint is that the front has some sharp spots, we have to be careful that the drink cans don't hit too hard or it will puncture them.
customer_reviews.author: JD and Cali

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy, works well.
customer_reviews.text: This took me well less than 5 minutes to assemble, and was very easy to adjust to fit all of the different sizes of cans that I have. Took stacks of cans with a danger of falling over and made them neat and easy to see, with no danger of falling over. Perfect for my pantry!
customer_reviews.author: Blixic

customer_reviews.title: great product - easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: great product - easy to assemble, sturdy and very versatile. I bought two of these for our panty and they're perfect (see pic). Everything accessible. Great for those things one stocks up on like cans of tuna, black beans, etc etc. Far better solution than stacking cans!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Hatlestad

customer_reviews.title: The metal frame goes together easy enough. Problem comes when you try to install ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't recall ever returning anything to Amazon but the Can Organizer is going back. The one sent me simply does not work. The metal frame goes together easy enough. Problem comes when you try to install can separators. The ones sent with my package were plastic and to short to clip on. They simply pop off. I note the picture shows metal dividers on box. Maybe those would work, but they were not supplied. I can tell you the plastic ones don't work. Don't buy this until they fix the problems.
customer_reviews.author: Geometry daily

customer_reviews.title: Great for budget
customer_reviews.text: These are great for organization. It opened my eyes to how many cans of various foods I had in my pantry. I had 32 cans of various beans and filled up the one organizer that I ordered. It did not make a dent in the various cans of soup, tuna, tomatoes, etc that I still have in the pantry. It also made me realize how much I would buy just because it was on sale. I could use two more of these organizers; but only have room for one more. Having this organizer will help me with my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice for seeing what you own.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and several other items from Amazon as part of a pantry makeover. I am amazed at how much nicer my pantry looks with these set up and how much easier it is to see the cans. I did lose a little space from just stacking them up, but I can see clearly what I have. The shelves are not the most stable and I wouldn't stack them on top of each other. Once they are set up in single file, however, they are fine. I especially like that the separators can be adjusted for different can sizes. The shelves are not so close together that you cannot see back at what is deeper on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great can organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great can organizer! It was very easy to assemble. You just need to pay attention to the instructions, and flip the "wings/sides" all the way around instead of just opening them half-way, which would seem to be right if you don't read the instructions clearly. I saw two pantry organization videos on YouTube, and they both recommended this one. I'm so glad I bought it. It fits perfectly in my pantry and can also hold smaller jars, like my Sir Kensington mayo. It has really opened up some space in my pantry. I highly recommend this one. Very well-made and easy to put together. :)
customer_reviews.author: Energy Coach

customer_reviews.title: This is so great
customer_reviews.text: I can't express enough how great this is in my pantry. I am redoing it and have decided to use this for everything I have shelves that are spaced high above each other this is perfect to use that space. I have had this one for about 3 years and it's still perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Had First One for 1 1/2 years - Bought a Second One
customer_reviews.text: Really Great - well built and fits our pantry so good (your mileage may vary here) - Bought one approx 18 months ago - liked it so much we bought a second one and the organization truly helps. Would unconditionally recommend. If you spend a minute or two looking at the instructions - the assembly is straightforward and takes less than 5 minutes the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing
customer_reviews.text: The first organizer I bought was easy to assemble and worked well, so I ordered another. The second one was a tighter fit and required help to put together. I bought one more, and the 3rd one was such a tight fit that the structure was curving in and the dividers were too short and couldn't be used. The 3rd organizer was returned.
customer_reviews.author: DE

customer_reviews.title: Best space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful organizational tool. I bought cheap ones from Marshalls a few weeks ago and was very disappointed. Returned them and looked on Amazon for a higher quality item. This one was more than I planned on spending but I couldn't be happier. It freed up a TON of space. The best thing about it is the dividers because it allows you to put all different sizes of cans.
customer_reviews.author: MomDDS

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! It is sturdy, was not a problem to assemble, and let's me store and see what canned goods I have in the pantry better than having them on a turn-table, etc. I ordered four and am using some of the spaces for things like pudding and gelatin boxes, unopened bottles, etc. I put the small boxes in a low sided plastic tray that I can pull out to get the flavor I want. Deco Brothers even sent more detailed assembly instructions which helped sidestep any problems there. It will not hold large cans except on its top shelf, if your pantry shelf is high enough for that.
customer_reviews.author: God lover

customer_reviews.title: Helps You Organize
customer_reviews.text: The company contacted me after hearing many customers complain about the instructions being vague or wrong about how to put the can rack organizer together. I really appreciated the company verifying that I was clear on how to put the organizer together. The organizer is durable enough to hold cans in every spot, but without any cans inside of it, the organizer would be kind of flimsy. For the price, this can organizer is helpful for any kitchen or pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these racks for my pantry to keep things organized. After a problem with the mailing of these items which delayed me receiving them for ten days, customer service helped us out and we got them a few days ago. I can say that the racks are great and doing their job. I put them together in a few minutes and loaded them up with cans. I still have additional room. I would recommend this to everyone who is looking for a storage solution.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong...
customer_reviews.text: I did quite a bit of research before this purchase as I wanted sometime really reliable for my New Year's pantry reorganization project. After reading all of the great reviews for this product (and the crappy ones for the Container Store version), I bought them and am glad I did. They were very easy to assemble yet are sturdy and stack a ton of cans. I forgot to measure the height of the shelf I wanted to put it on though and it was too high for that space. A little reorganization later, it fit perfectly. Great product, now I'm organized!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bosman

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to simple assembly directions!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I pay close attention to the simple assembly instructions. Look at the pictures and you’ll see that you have to swing those side arms completely around 270° . I did not stack so I can’t comment about that but the three row can rack itself is solid and now I won’t keep buying things I don’t need because I can see what I have! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy I have bought in a long time!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together & just love how all my cans are so much more organized in my pantry, instead of falling down when they are all stacked! Excellent quality! Great value for the $$. Highly recommend! My life will be easier for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This rack is exactly what I needed. Only thing I find lacking is the instructions. There are pictures but not many words. Took me longer than it should have to get it together correctly but it was well worth it once it was assembled. I may get another one and stock up on canned goods.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Galati

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. I had a problem with my pantry shelving, not enough space between shelves to use it where I wanted. So I had to sit on the floor. Still works great, did exactly what I wanted to allow more storage in my pantry. Don’t forget to measure your height between shelves before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Della T Wix

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As to be expected. I bought this rack to stick inside my cabinet but unfortunately it was a little bit too big to fit in there so I have it on my counter. I like it and plan on buying another one. It did come with canned dividers but I am not using them and I forgot to take a picture of them.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Like it!
customer_reviews.text: It's seems to be pretty great and exactly what they posted, I've had it put together maybe two days so I'm not 100% on how much I like it yet, because it hasn't been long enough of use. But what I will say the downside I have found so far is the instructions; they are so complicated and only give vague pictures. They even sent an email trying to explain it but still had problems, but finally figured it out that I had the trays upside down. And I would recommend putting the trays from top to bottom, seemed to help get it in better. But all around good product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time an is exactly as shown. I bought one for myself and later for my mother. They are easy to assemble and hold a lot without taking up a lot of room. They are sturdy and easy to clean, if need be. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grutzmacher

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME. It’s hard to get excited about organizational storage (for some people - I freaking love it, personally) but this took an entire laundry basket filled with cans and held them all (to clarify, I ordered 2 of the organizers)
customer_reviews.author: mandypandy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite piece of pantry storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first rack back in 2015 and it has lasted through two moves and looks as good as the day I bought it. Recently decided to buy a second and you really can't tell which is the new one and which is the old. My only complaint is that I wish they gave you an extra divider or sold some separately. I put smaller cans in my organizer, so the two per self they provide you with isn't enough.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: So much added pantry storage!
customer_reviews.text: What a great little rack! I put it together in about 2 minutes and had it in my pantry loaded with all of my canned vegetables in about 10 minutes. It cleared up soooo much space in my pantry and I can actually find things now! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dani G

customer_reviews.title: Quite a heavy-duty rack. Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many can rack organizers, I elected to buy this one. What a great decision! First, the packaging for this product is perfect, with all of the pieces wrapped in plastic. And I was pleased (and somewhat shocked) at how heavy-duty this one was - definitely not a cheap lightweight rack. Assembling it took all of two minutes, and the manufacturer actually emailed additional/clarifying instructions once my order was received. If you follow them (including drawings), it's impossible not to assemble it correctly - and quickly. I don't give many products five stars, but this rack is the real deal. Now my pantry is really organized!
customer_reviews.author: rjgtn1

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price, organization of canned goods and no problems!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for organizing my pantry. The instructions were clear and because other customers had problems putting it together, they sent an additional email to make sure the instructions were very clear! So far there have been no problems, no collapses or canned goods not fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Shelf Tamer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, Sturdy Once in Place
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 5 minutes to put this together. Before I received it, I got an e-mail from the manufacturer saying they'd had had complaints, so were providing more detailed instructions. I didn't look at them, just figured I would if I had problems, which I didn't. The paper attached to the sides tell you which side faces out, so perhaps that is new after other reviewers said they had problems. It works great in my pantry - plenty sturdy enough and I can quickly find what I need. Unfortunately, I can only use one since the rest of my shelves -- which are permanent -- are too close together for the height of this.
customer_reviews.author: brondyblue

customer_reviews.title: Like this can organizer
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law purchased one of these and I liked it so much, so I bought one for myself. It's very easy to put together and super sturdy - a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moore

customer_reviews.title: Still standing strong since 2017!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and still standing strong in our cupboard since early 2017 when we bought it. It's really nifty if you tend to keep a lot of canned food. We've also just used it as a shelf to store other things like bags of rice and pasta.
customer_reviews.author: MrsCNott

customer_reviews.title: Not built for heavy cans
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for canned goods. My pantry shelves are the slotted metal type as opposed to built in wooden shelving. This might feel sturdier if my shelves were wooden. It is also too tall so I had to put it on the top shelf. This makes it very hard to reach. Most of the plastic shelf dividers pop off. So only a few would stay on so my cans slide around. My soup cans are heavy making it hard to retrieve cans from the lower two shelves defeating the purpose of this type of product. I would have returned it but just don’t have the time to deal with it. So for me it get a thumbs down.👎
customer_reviews.author: Martha M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Type A Pantry!
customer_reviews.text: So wonderful for my pantry organization! I knew it would be difficult to place since most of our pantry shelves aren't tall enough but I was able to get it to fit on our top shelf. I like how it fits many sizes of cans at once and I don't have to pick and choose which ones to put up. I didn't have any problems with the set up and it only took me a few minutes. If we had the need or room for another I would definitely get one more. I'll keep this in mind for the future though should our family and canned goods needs expand.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this can organizer was easy to put together, as I usually have difficulty putting tab A in slot B. :) I realized that I didn't even know what cans I had because they were crammed in my cupboard. It fix 36 normal size cans, but not the huge ones of course. I'm satisfied. On the counter now, the cans are displayed in an easy to see manner, which means I'm using more of them and not buying duplicates. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite perfect
customer_reviews.text: The organizer looks great and it is a good size with great capacity; however, the assembly was harder than I anticipated and despite several attempts all the components did not align perfectly which makes the dividers pop-up. I want to love this organizer, but it falls short.
customer_reviews.author: Aries Hopf

customer_reviews.title: No more can chaos
customer_reviews.text: Was a breeze to put together with the instructions sent to my email and in the product box. Disappointed that I didn't measure it properly for the product to fit originally where I had in mind. However, after much adjustment I love how organized the can goods are now. I also like the fact the wired chrome matches my container store products for a seamless clean modern look. At first I thought there wouldn't be enough spacers for all my can goods, but it ended up working perfectly. I looked at other reviews about it falling over and I do want to note I don't have anything stacked on top of mine.
customer_reviews.author: stacy bowman

customer_reviews.title: Now I know when I need to buy something!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could look in my pantry and know what I need to buy when I go to the store. It was quick and easy to put together. I removed a multitude of cans, put this on the shelf after a quick dusting, started to fill it up and soon noticed I have so many cans of sweet potatoes and baked beans but almost no other varieties. I couldn't be happier with this purchase and may buy one more.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for normal sized cans, bit difficult with tuna/cat food tins.
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to assemble (just open the sides all the way, 270 degrees) and they are perfect for normal-sized, 10-15oz, cans. The only difficult thing to store are smaller cans - like tuna or cat food items. Even when they are all pushed together as shown in the product images, they still bobble and get partially stuck in the grooves.. I laid down a small section of hard plastic to accommodate these.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal, AZ

customer_reviews.title: This is genious
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part was reorganizing our shelving to fit this in our pantry. Not the can racks fault at all, we just needed to make enough space to be able to utilize it. Something we had been talking about before this conception. Putting it together was a breeze. Even before it arrived the DecoBros sent us an email with very detailed instructions on its assembly. Thank you but, we really didn't need it. Got it together and put it place. We like it well enough to ask for another one from Santa at Christmas. Thank you DecoBros for helping us tame our wild pantry.
customer_reviews.author: N. Abdallah

customer_reviews.title: Order one today if you want more pantry space! Attractive design. I hope I will be able to order
customer_reviews.text: Great for organization. Did not like the dividers. Gives me a great deal of extra storage in my pantry. Highly recommend and would order one more. Attractive design.Assembly instructions are not very clear
customer_reviews.author: dlight

customer_reviews.title: I like not having to dig around the cupboards for something ...
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you follow instructions when putting it together: Specifically, flip the sides around to face the other way, and follow the arrows properly on the dividers. The three racks fit all sorts of cans, from tuna to large bean cans. I like not having to dig around the cupboards for something when I'm in the middle of making dinner. I also like taking quick inventory before a shopping trip. Very convenient! The one thing that surprised me is the size. I don't know why, but it just seemed larger in person. Good thing I took measurements of my cabinet before buying! It's more of a pantry item than for regular kitchen cupboards.
customer_reviews.author: V is Me

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Do not let the reviews about the difficulty of putting this device together scare you off! It took me 5 minutes to assemble mine without any issues. I did appreciate that Deco Bros sent me an email right away with detailed pictures and instructions attached just to make sure there were no issues. I am very excited to use this rack and if it works as well as I think it's going to I will definitely order more.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage for cans.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect for cans. I don’t use the little plastic divider things that came with it. I like that you could connect more to it, but this is perfect for us right now. Great storage idea.
customer_reviews.author: Glenna E James

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to put together as long as you follow the pictures since there are no written instructions. Like that I can actually see what canned goods I have now. So far it’s working out perfectly. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: busyactonmom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with bowed in sides.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and packed as it appears in the photos. Instructions are not the easiest to understand. Would not assemble properly and it turns out the 2 sides are bent/bowed in in the middle, thus not allowing the shelves to lock in properly. In perfect condition, this seems like a decent product, but for the extra cost, I think the quality control should be a lot better. UPDATE: 12092015 - To the company's credit, they shipped out a replacement unit right away after I contacted the with the problem. The second one has straight (unbent) sides and works as advertised. Revising my star score from 2 to 4. ~ Kort
customer_reviews.author: Kort

customer_reviews.title: The organizer was quite easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The organizer was quite easy to assemble.The instructions were quite clear. After assembly though i realised that the shelves were not resting flat but popping out of the vertical supports. As such i had to use some tie straps to hold the shelves down. Again i noticed that the completed organizer was not completely level but rocked back and forth at the base. The weight of the cans took care of that.To conclude i must say that the organizer does what it is intended to do. It handles the weight of the cans well and helps to keep my pantry well organized. I hope that this helps
customer_reviews.author: Francis V

customer_reviews.title: Larger than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is BIG... Way bigger than the picture looks and I was expecting. Actually, it initially was too shelves and would not fit in my pantry. I just had it sitting on the floor and now I ended up moving and it fits. (Ps if you're wondering why I didn't measure it -duh!- it's because I'm a chick so I'm not really good with taking measurements and I didn't really think about it. It looked like it would fit, so I just went with it. Lesson learned). Anyway, overall I'm still satified with it! Holds a good amount of cans and keeps them organized.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: A pantry necessity!
customer_reviews.text: Pregnancy nesting can be a very dangerous situation to the finances. Luckily, I found numerous DecoBros products that I love, including the stackable can holder. This unit is big enough to hold the boxed soups too, is durable and attractive and is exactly what I needed for my pantry. The company provided very clear directions for assembly and even sent a separate email to clarify the most common misstep people make when assembling it...which was very much appreciated but highly unnecessary. I will be buying these as gifts in the future.
customer_reviews.author: MaryLiz Kerecman

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit between the shelves in my pantry and it’s pretty useless down on the floor. No help at all ! Very disappointing and the short return window expired before my other pantry shelf liners were all received and I had time to devote to revamping my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Bicki

customer_reviews.title: Really great, but measure before you order!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these. Unfortunately I forgot to measure! They didn’t fit anywhere I could have used them...but a friend is thrilled with them. I gave them to her so they would be put to good use.
customer_reviews.author: JustJoJo

customer_reviews.title: I love it!  Worth the purchase and then some.
customer_reviews.text: I love this organizer so much! It was really, really easy to assemble and it's super sturdy! It allowed me to organize a bunch of cans on my pantry shelving unit, and there is no doubt that I will order another one! There is so much more organization to happen! I have to say that this could be used in so many applications as well. In the work shop for organizing containers of bolts, screws, etc. In the bathroom for organizing beauty products; since you can customize the spaces on each rack it makes even that application a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy PPQ

customer_reviews.title: This can rack was fairly easy to assemble if you got the sides facing right
customer_reviews.text: This can rack was fairly easy to assemble if you got the sides facing right. Pay attention to the note. It's exactly the size listed, lightweight but sturdy and includes 6 plastic dividers (2 per shelf) that help keep cans in place. It hold about 25-27 cans depending on the height of the cans.It's very convenient and more than enough room for the cans I have. Once you get the cans loaded its very heavy, so start by putting the organizer in place on your shelves or in your cupboard, then add the cans.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for organizing the cans in my pantry. I found it very easy to put together, only took a few minutes. My pantry shelf tilts a little to the front (probably from all the heavy stuff stored on it) and since this is made of polished metal, it could slide forward easily. To avert a potentially messy and dangerous fall, I put a piece of that non-adhesive non-slip shelf and drawer liner under it (Con-Tact brand makes a nice version, available in many colors on Amazon) This was the perfect solution since it is not going anywhere now!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Love this can organizer!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to stay neatly organized. Thanks! Update a year later: we are still using these organizers and love them. We have two of them now and it really helps in our family to know what we have and what I need to purchase more of. I have shared a picture but not very organized right now. Still works as well as the day we bought them.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Best Panty Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I haven't bothered to write a review before now, I love these. I have never been so organized in my pantry life. I am not even going to bother with pictures because so many wonderful people have already submitted photos that made me buy these. I did not stack mine but have them side by side on party selves and all of my cans are easy to get to and see.
customer_reviews.author: My Old KY Home

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. I have mine stacked three high. This has helped me save so much space and help keep my can together so I know what I have and to know what I need to bbn pick up.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Meeks

customer_reviews.title: Pantry Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this can organizer! They keep all of my canned goods visible and neatly stacked. Before, I had them all lining the shelves in my pantry, one behind the other and others stacked, so I couldn't see what was in there until I took them all out. I love that I can see all the cans that I have at one time! This has saved a lot of time, as well as space!
customer_reviews.author: Hyun C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These are abosolutely amazing! My pantry is now organized and I can actually see what I have. No more buying things I already have numerous of. They are a bit difficult in pushing down the shelf to lock in, but this is very sturdy is why it’s a bit hard to push down. Just have someone strong to push for you. Goes together in less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: joyce freeman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing!
customer_reviews.text: Working on decluttering and organizing my house, starting with the kitchen. What took up an entire shelf of cans, fits in this rack and leaves 1/3 of the shelf space left for other items in the pantry! I am going to order a couple more of these because they are so great!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Marie Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: 3 1/2 minutes to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Just received this organizer today. I timed how long it took me to put it together from the time I had everything laid out on the counter. 3 1/2 minutes. The pieces fit together well and it feels sturdy. If you're having trouble fitting it together, you probably have the frame arms pointed the wrong way. Look at the zoomed illustrations carefully. It's really helping to organize the pantry. Ordered a second one this afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: flyingest

customer_reviews.title: Don't be an idiot like me and measure your shelf
customer_reviews.text: I'm an idiot and did not measure my pantry shelf before ordering. I thought "meh, it'll fit. It's a big pantry." It did not. I had to put it on my top shelf to make it work, but it's a good shelf and holds a lot. I was able to move less used canned goods and canned good from those Costco megapaks up there. When putting it together, just read the directions. It looks simple enough, but you have to have the arms go the right way to make it work. The way it's shipped is counter-intuitive to set up.
customer_reviews.author: KaliMau

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. Follow the directions and it's very easy to assemble. My pantry is a closet with deep shelves which makes it hard to organize - you can't reach things in the back. This solved that and allowed me to utilize the vertical space, opening up more shelf space. It holds plenty of cans for me, and I also added other jarred items. This is a great organizational solution for any pantry.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Did not have any problems assembling. The instructions were very clear if one takes the time to read the steps and study the pictures (it was mostly picture instructions). I assembled it, disassembled it, and reassembled it all with no problems (1st assembly took me less than 5 minutes). Due to all the complaints on assembly, the seller sent an e-mail shortly after the order was made with additional tips and tricks, which was appreciated but unnecessary once I received it and saw how simple a device it actually is. Great product, great seller. Will be checking out their other products.
customer_reviews.author: VC KY

customer_reviews.title: The rack organizer was fairly easy to put together though the engineer in me winces ...
customer_reviews.text: The rack organizer was fairly easy to put together though the engineer in me winces a bit on how they keep the racks on (The rack has to be pushed in while on the metal bar to provide tension instead of being put on top, efficient and it works well bit I felt like I was going to break it) The rack ended up being a bit taller than would fit in my cupboard so I put it on the top shelf. The rack fits a surprisingly large number of cans! I would recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated Wasted Cabinet Space!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Had plastic ones at one point and they were worthless. Set this one up and immediately ordered another from Amazon. It's sturdy, can be customized to fit many different sizes of cans, and makes my big cabinets much more organized and user-friendly. It completely takes-up the wasted space in the back of my cabinets where nothing can be seen. I was shocked at all of the random cans I had too many of because I just keep re-purchasing the items when I can't find them. What I will be saving in outdated, repurchased canned goods will more than pay for this investment.
customer_reviews.author: H. K. Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy racks and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of the racks was delivered without the separators, and a phone call to customer service got the missing part delivered with no problem! Great to work with, and a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works, kinda?
customer_reviews.text: Had trouble with the installation. Did not work where I wanted it to. Tried another configuration and it will do. Trouble was in the pantry slide out drawer you cant see the cans on the 2nd and 3rd tier down. She made it work so it is OK an if it is ok for her...it is great for me.
customer_reviews.author: RJChip

customer_reviews.title: Not for a wire rack pantry
customer_reviews.text: It was nice except I should if measured the width of my pantry opening. It was a very tight fit. Also, my pantry is wire racks and it does not sit on the wire racks well. So we are using it out in our garage where we have a wood shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Herron

customer_reviews.title: A real pantry improvement.
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I had purchased these can organizers years ago. What a wonderful improvement to my pantry. The racks are sturdy and easy to assemble. No more searching through cans double stacked with the labels turned from sight. I purchased second after having used the first for only a few weeks. Just great!
customer_reviews.author: C. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not practical
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks cool, works as advertised, very sturdy. My friends see this in my pantry and think I'm well-organized. Cons: You can only get the can in front. If you want a can in back, all the cans in front of it must come out. So if you want to use it to store all of the same thing in each section, that's a good use. Otherwise, you can't access, or see very well, the cans in the back. I have it set up between 2 shelves in my pantry, so I can't access the top row's cans from the back, either.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not to great!
customer_reviews.text: So I like the concept of this! But the spacers to seperate the fans wouldn’t stay on there! So maybe I’ll keep it and try to deal with it until I can find something perfect
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and no issues (read the instructions!)
customer_reviews.text: The company went out of their way to ensure that one knows how to properly put this together. Folks, if you put it together wrong, you have no one to blame but yourself because you decided not to read the instructions. It is easy to put together and does an awesome job and storing cans. This was something I had been looking at for a while and it does the job. I will probably be getting a few more of these in the coming weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Frame so bent I can’t put it together
customer_reviews.text: Horrible I received the product and it was so bent I couldn’t attach any of the shelves properly! I will be returning for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is that it is slightly wider than my shelf. My fault, though, as I did not take measurements before purchasing. Instructions were easy to follow, quick to assemble. Have only had it for a few days, but working out great so far.
customer_reviews.author: KWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea, NOT well built...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Assemble, Yes. But, the Can Rack Organizer would not stay together if you touched it... Seems like a Good Idea NOT Though Out Well Enough... Will not buy again...
customer_reviews.author: J. Walley

customer_reviews.title: Helps organize my pantry
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of bringing order to cans in my pantry while allowing more vertical storage without can stacking that always ends up with loosing cans in the back. Not expensive but still sturdy enough to fill full with cans. Easy to access. Just make sure to follow instructions when assembling since side walls need to flip in a specific direction.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy, and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, great product! After ordering it I received additional instructions from the seller to help assemble it, but when it arrived I had no problem at all putting it together (visual was enough for me, but maybe their detailed instructions are helpful to others). As long as those side wings face the proper way, it comes together easy-breezy. I loaded it up and am thrilled to have my cans organized. Now the seller just needs to make one that is two rows high (vs three) because my other shelves are not as tall as the top one I had bought this one for. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SimonSays

customer_reviews.title: problem storage for pop cans
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to use the product for the reason I ordered it. The Handles on the top made it too high for the shelf. However it was perfect to store pop cans in the laundry room. After I submitted this review, I discovered that some pop cans were leaking. Evidently the metal on pop cans is not strong enough or thick enough to withstand rolling down when the first can is removed. What a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, well-made rack for storing can goods. I am very pleased with this purchase, and would recommend this product. Despite comments and concerns in regard to the assembly being confusing, I did not find it the least bit confusing. It is simple to put together if you take a moment to read the very clear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Save lots of Space
customer_reviews.text: This storage bin saves lots of space in my pantry. I can now get what I want without searching. Great for small spaces. Organization is the key to everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great Pantry Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I bought it to do. Setup was simple, it's sturdy, and it really helped organize the cans in our pantry. The only reason I didn't rate it 5 stars is because it's hard to access any cans that aren't in front - you have to manually pull all the ones out in front to get to one behind, then put all the other cans you didn't want back, because there's just not enough room for a hand to reach in. But it's far from a fatal flaw - I've never seen a solution like this that didn't have that same problem. So I would definitely recommend this for pantry storage.
customer_reviews.author: theRuffTeej

customer_reviews.title: Great product but instructions are not helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but the directions to put together are very misleading and not helpful. The company even sends you an email stating the directions that come with it should have more direction so the email is suppose to suffice but it didn't at all. The product seems well made and useful, but you have to figure out how to put it together. You would think its fairly simple but it is more complicated than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy E

customer_reviews.title: Good rack, great company!
customer_reviews.text: As far as can organizers go, this one was pretty standard--easy to put together, relatively stable, and holds as many cans as advertised! However, I was especially impressed by the customer service. In addition to the written instructions, which admittedly I originally misread, they sent an email clarifying the instructions for people like me that misread them! Make sure you pay special attention to which way you fold the large outer frame. Getting such good service for a small, wire rack purchase was very impressive. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good product, just make sure it fits in your pantry.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 4 star review because the plastic dividers are difficult to place. The company sent the instructions on how to put it together buy email. It takes a little while to figure out how to do it, but once you do is not difficult at all. Just make sure you know the measurements on your pantry, I was able to fully use the middle and bottom rack; however, on the first rack, I was only able to use the front part because the whole rack barely fitted in my small pantry. Over all, good product. My cans are organized and I can see what I have available.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this organizer. My pantry needed something to organize all the cans. This is perfect, and will definately purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Merten

customer_reviews.title: It works great in my pantry
customer_reviews.text: It works great in my pantry. Just the right size and good quality. I ordered two of them and they come already partially assembled. One of the two was assembled incorrectly. Luckily my husband is very handy and with a pair of pliers he was able to take the assembled pieces apart and reattach them in the correct way. It would have been a bit difficult to do that for some people and I am sure they would have returned the item. We were lucky to have 2 sets so we could tell right away that one was wrong. I still give them 5 stars because I love the way they worked after we got them redone.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Gila

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: This product requires assembly, which is fine, but it does not stay together and is not the quality expected. I would not recommend it nor would I buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DecoBros Supreme Stackable Can Rack Organizer, Chrome Finish
product_meta.description: DecoBros CanRack is a good solution for your kitchen to organize and store Cans.
feature_bullets: Store up to 36 Can w/ variable size, Capable to stack, a smart way to increase the storage size
Made from heavy gauge steel, sturdy and strong, Elegant Chrome Finish
Adjustable plastic dividers provide more flexibility to stores your grocery

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,972 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
